image.alt: Nichols Orthodontics team and patients smiling in a bright modern office

paragraphs.text: Achieve your perfect smile — it’s about more than teeth; it’s about the people. Our expert orthodontic and aesthetic care goes beyond straightening teeth to craft beautiful, lasting smiles tailored to each patient.
We use a personalized Nichols Smile approach and advanced diagnostics to create treatment plans that prioritize facial aesthetics, airway health, and long-term stability.

items.title: Board-Certified Leadership
items.text: Dr. Trevor Nichols is a board-certified orthodontist, educator, and creator of the Nichols Smile Score, bringing world-class expertise and an aesthetic focus to every case.

items.title: Nichols Smile Score
items.text: Objective, individualized aesthetic planning that considers facial proportions, lip support, and smile arc for predictable, beautiful outcomes.

items.title: Airway-Centered Care
items.text: Advanced digital diagnostics, including airway evaluation and 3D imaging, to guide treatment that supports breathing, facial development, and stability.

items.title: Retainer Program
items.text: High-quality retainers and an unlimited eight-year retainer program to protect your investment and keep your smile looking its best.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Trevor Nichols, DMD, MS, is a board-certified orthodontist and educator, creator of the Nichols Smile Score, and a Diplomat of the American Board of Orthodontics. He trained at the Arizona School of Dentistry and Oral Health for his dental degree and completed specialty training in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics, earning a master’s focused on TMD research. Dr. Nichols blends evidence-based mechanics with an aesthetic philosophy that prioritizes the person behind the smile.

image.alt: Dr. Trevor Nichols headshot

paragraphs.text: Daniela Millyard, RN, BSN, is a nurse injector and aesthetic technician who provides complementary cosmetic treatments such as lip fillers, Botox, Sculptra, and gummy smile care to enhance facial balance alongside orthodontic treatment.

image.alt: Daniela Millyard RN headshot

paragraphs.text: We offer modern orthodontic solutions tailored to your Nichols Smile plan, from clear aligners to braces, with a focus on long-term stability and facial aesthetics.

image.alt: Spark clear aligners for aesthetic orthodontic treatment
Damon and metal braces treatment
Orthodontic retainers to preserve treatment results
Airway-focused orthodontic evaluation and treatment

og_meta.title: Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics
og_meta.description: Aesthetic-focused orthodontics offering Spark aligners, braces, airway diagnostics, and long-term retainer care.

image.alt: Nichols Orthodontics team smiling together in a bright, welcoming office

paragraphs.text: It’s about more than teeth. It’s about the people. Our expert orthodontic and aesthetic care goes beyond straightening teeth — we craft beautiful, lasting smiles tailored to each person, with attention to facial balance, airway health, and long‑term function.

We use an objective, personalized approach called the Nichols Smile Score to guide treatment decisions. That system helps us plan care that considers facial aesthetics, alignment, bite function, and each patient’s lifestyle so results look natural and last.

image.alt: Dr. Trevor Nichols headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Trevor Nichols, DMD, MS, is a board‑certified orthodontist and educator who focuses on aesthetic, airway‑aware orthodontics. He has treated thousands of patients since beginning practice, combining meticulous clinical technique with a patient‑first approach.

Dr. Nichols is a Diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics and regularly lectures and teaches clinicians internationally. His work blends comprehensive orthodontics, dentofacial orthopedics, and advanced aesthetic planning.

image.alt: Dr. Trevor Nichols smiling during a clinical presentation

paragraphs.text: Dr. Nichols graduated as valedictorian from Arizona State University, earned his Doctorate in Dental Medicine from the Arizona School for Dentistry and Oral Health where he served as class president, and completed specialty training in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics, earning a Master’s in Orthodontics with research on temporomandibular disorders.

image.alt: Dr. Nichols speaking at a professional meeting

paragraphs.text: Comprehensive care for children, teens, and adults, dentofacial orthopedics, airway‑focused treatment planning, and aesthetic smile design guided by the Nichols Smile Score. Dr. Nichols also mentors clinicians through hands‑on mentorships and in‑practice education.

image.alt: Clinical close-up showing orthodontic treatment planning

paragraphs.text: Outside the office Dr. Nichols is husband to Alyssa and father of four boys. He values fitness, faith, and family, and brings that same dedication to patient care with the belief that thoughtful, consistent effort leads to exceptional outcomes.

image.alt: Dr. Nichols interacting with patients during an educational event
Dr. Brian Rochford headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Brian Rochford works with Nichols Orthodontics as a visiting clinician and mentor. He joins the practice for mentorship days and educational events, sharing clinical insights with visiting clinicians and contributing to the practice’s hands‑on learning environment.

image.alt: Dr. Brian Rochford participating in a mentorship session

paragraphs.text: Information about visiting clinician dates and mentorship requests is available through the practice’s mentorship pages. Clinicians interested in observing or arranging mentorship should use the mentorship inquiry anchors on the site to request details and availability.

image.alt: Dr. Rochford teaching during a clinical session

items.name: Alyssa Nichols
items.bio: Co‑owner and the patient experience lead, Alyssa ensures each visit is personal and memorable while supporting patients and families throughout treatment.

image.alt: Alyssa Nichols smiling

items.name: Daniela Millyard, RN, BSN
items.bio: Registered nurse and aesthetic injector with advanced training; Daniela blends clinical skill with a patient‑centered approach to natural, confidence‑boosting results.

image.alt: Daniela Millyard professional headshot

items.name: Frances Clark
items.bio: Office manager with over a decade in orthodontics who keeps daily operations running smoothly and ensures patients receive attentive, efficient care.

image.alt: Frances Clark office manager headshot

items.name: Nichols Orthodontics Team
items.bio: A collaborative team of clinicians and support staff dedicated to comfortable, modern care and excellent patient experiences from first visit to retention.

image.alt: Nichols Orthodontics team group photo

slides.alt: Clinical treatment room with modern equipment
Treatment area showing technology and comfort features

paragraphs.text: Nichols Orthodontics invests in education and community by hosting mentorship days, in‑practice continuing education, and visiting clinician events. Dr. Nichols regularly lectures regionally and internationally and welcomes clinicians who want hands‑on learning and mentorship.

Clinicians interested in mentorship or visiting days can request details through the mentorship inquiry anchors on the site. The practice values sharing best practices and building a learning community that raises clinical standards for everyone.

image.alt: Graphic representing community support and mentorship activities
Family enjoying time together

og_meta.title: About Us | Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics
og_meta.description: Learn about Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics — our philosophy, team, mentorships, and Dr. Trevor Nichols' patient‑first approach to aesthetic, airway‑aware ort

image.alt: Welcoming family at Nichols Orthodontics reception

paragraphs.text: Your first visit begins with a thorough consultation with a treatment coordinator. We take X-rays and photos so Dr. Nichols can calculate your Nichols Smile Score, assess your smile, and explain the treatment options that best fit your goals.
We’ll review your medical history, answer questions about insurance and financing, and create a customized treatment plan so you feel informed and ready to move forward.

image.alt: Parent and child at orthodontic reception

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and can file claims electronically to make your visit easier.
Flexible payment plans are available, and our treatment coordinator will help you find an option that fits your budget.
Please complete new patient and health history forms before your appointment so we can provide safe, personalized care. If you need assistance, our team is happy to help by phone or at your visit.

image.alt: Patient completing new patient forms online
Family enjoying time together

seo.page_keywords: Nichols Orthodontics, new patient, Nichols Smile Score, consultation, Queen Creek, orthodontics

og_meta.title: Get Started | Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics
og_meta.description: Begin your Nichols Orthodontics journey in Queen Creek. Find what to expect at your first visit, access new patient forms, financing info, and schedule a free相談

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Lakeshore Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Damon Braces are a self-ligating bracket system that helps us move teeth efficiently while creating broader, more natural-looking smiles. Dr. Nichols combines modern bracket systems with digital bonding to tailor treatment for kids, teens, and adults.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Spark Aligners (TruGEN™) are a clear, removable option that fits into a fully digital workflow. We use precise 3D scans and planning software to create personalized aligner series that move teeth predictably while letting you eat and brush normally.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Palate expanders gently widen a narrow upper jaw to create room for permanent teeth, improve smile width, and help airway development. They are often used early to guide healthy growth and reduce the need for more complex treatments later.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic intervention

paragraphs.text: TADs are small, temporary mini-screws used as fixed anchors to move teeth in ways traditional mechanics cannot. They help refine tooth position, correct difficult movements, and can be part of non-surgical gummy smile and finishing strategies.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation

paragraphs.text: The Herbst appliance advances the lower jaw in growing patients to improve bite relationships and facial balance. It’s a useful non-surgical option when lower jaw advancement is needed as part of comprehensive treatment planning.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient receiving a surgical consultation

paragraphs.text: Our retainer program helps protect your investment in a finished smile. We offer custom retainers made from precise scans or impressions, with options for removable or fixed designs and an unlimited, eight-year replacement program for qualifying patients.

image.alt: Young woman holding an orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: Gummy smile concerns can often be addressed with non-surgical approaches tailored to each patient. We may use aligners, braces, TADs, or gingival reshaping depending on the cause. Treatments are typically recommended once adult dentition is established.

image.alt: Adult patient receiving orthodontic treatment

paragraphs.text: Our airway-focused orthodontic care aims to identify and improve breathing-related issues. We assess airway volume and structure and may use expanders, orthopedic appliances, or coordinated care to help improve airflow and long-term health.

image.alt: Orthodontic consultation focused on airway and facial profile
Family enjoying time together

og_meta.title: Contact Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics | Queen Creek Orthodontist
og_meta.description: Contact Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics in Queen Creek. Call (480) 442-0747 or schedule a free consultation online.

image.alt: Bright, welcoming orthodontic office reception with smiling staff and modern decor

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about scheduling, treatments, insurance, communications, emergencies, and aftercare at Nichols Orthodontics + Aesthetics.

accordion.header: How do I schedule a consultation?

paragraphs.text: Call or text us at 480.442.0747, email info@nicholsortho.com, or request an appointment online at https://www.nicholsortho.com/schedule-a-consultation/. We offer a complimentary consultation to review your goals and create a personalized plan.

image.alt: Nichols Orthodontics logo on white background

accordion.header: What treatment options do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We provide a full range of orthodontic care including Damon braces for efficient tooth movement, Spark Aligners for a discreet removable option, palatal expanders and TADs for more complex corrections, and custom retainers to protect your results. We also use the Nichols Smile Score to evaluate smile characteristics and recommend the best approach.

image.alt: Orthodontic braces on a dental model

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment time depends on your individual needs. Many patients complete active treatment in roughly 12 to 24 months, though complex cases can take longer. At your consultation we’ll provide an estimated timeline and regular progress checks to keep you on track.

image.alt: Orthodontic team reviewing treatment plan with patient

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment options to fit family budgets. Our front desk will help estimate benefits and set up manageable financing when needed.

image.alt: Clear retainer on a white background

accordion.header: Will you text or email me about appointments?

paragraphs.text: Yes. We send appointment reminders and occasional practice updates by text and email. If you no longer wish to receive texts, reply STOP to any message to opt out. For privacy questions contact info@nicholsortho.com.

image.alt: Nichols Orthodontics logo on dark background

paragraphs.text: Our Queen Creek office is at 20261 E Ocotillo Rd Suite 130, Queen Creek, AZ 85142. You can get turn-by-turn directions from the appointment page or follow the map on our website when you request a consultation.

image.alt: Exterior view of a modern dental office building

accordion.header: What should I do in an orthodontic emergency?

paragraphs.text: If you experience pain, a lost bracket, or a poking wire, call 480.442.0747 so we can triage and schedule an urgent appointment if needed. For severe uncontrolled bleeding or facial trauma, seek immediate medical attention or go to the nearest emergency room.

image.alt: Orthodontic team assisting a patient with emergency care

accordion.header: Do I need a retainer after treatment?

paragraphs.text: Yes. Retainers are essential to protect the teeth after active treatment. We provide custom retainers and a retention plan tailored to your case, with follow-up visits to ensure long-term stability.

image.alt: Clear plastic retainer on a white surface
Family enjoying time together
